title.narrative: Typhoon Ruby (Hagupit) response by TAO Pilipinas

description.narrative: The engagement of TAO-Pilipinas aims to provide: a. Technical support and advice to Christian Aid partners CCI and CERD in providing emergency shelter and cash transfers to affected households in Northern Samar and Samar provinces; b. Capacity building of local carpenters on disaster-resilient design, building back better, and humanitarian standards on shelter; and c. Orientation materials for partners and communities on disaster-resilient design, building back better, and humanitarian standards on shelter, focusing on shelter key messages and principles.
